sub_title: Product Marketing Manager Application Software at FEI Company
summary:
I am an international marketing professional in the fields of medical & biology imaging and informatics solution-creation. The combination of a medical university education, a bio-medical technical university education and an MBM (Master in B2B Marketing) helps me to exercise my passions; build innovations in the medical & biology arenas with strongly engaged professional global teams and bring them to the market successfully. 

I like to think out of the box and use my strengths in creativity and motivational leadership to drive professional teams to success. I am experienced at building bridges and managing business relationships. I have had ample opportunity and enjoy working with world leaders in their field.

My specialties are: medicine, bio-medical engineering, healthcare informatics, clinical informatics, workflow and collaboration solutions, sales and upstream as well as downstream Marketing.

education.degree_name: University of Tilburg, TIAS School for Business

organizations.name: KIVI - Royal Dutch Society of Engineers

profile_positions.description: As Product Marketing Manager Application Software for FEI's Life Sciences business unit I am responsible for all strategic and tactical activities that define and manage the application software landscape tying together the various instruments and workflows that build FEI's market offer in Life Sciences. It is aimed at strengthening and growing FEI’s presence on the market globally by optimally leveraging the current software offerings while acting as a driver for next generation solutions and architectures.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketing Manager Application Software Buiness Unit Life Sciences

profile_positions.description:
Senior Manager product Marketing EICI group, Philips Best
I was commercially responsible for the Philips IntelliSpace PACS client portfolio, working with teams in Best (Netherlands), Foster City (California) and Bangalore (India). I have successfully introduced Philips's zero footprint PACS product line enabling Philips to stay competitive and introduced a number of potentially business game changing innovations in clinical informatics and clinical usability. The latter was done in close cooperation with Philips research.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager product Marketing EICI group

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Advanced Visualization Clinical Applications program and the workstation portfolio. Main focus on internal B2B development and global market support for all other Philips Medical Systems business groups. 
Expanded our product presence with the BU Surgery, Ultrasound and PACS on top of existing businesses with BU General X-ray and Magnetic resonance.
profile_positions.title: Senior manager product marketing CIS group

profile_positions.description: Managing a product management team for workstations, PACS, Web image distribution and Radiology Information Systems. Within the management team I have defined a strategy and deployed a program to achieve product portfolio convergence and pruning, in order to enhance the results of the business line IT. An additional focus was on developing a comprehensive Medical IT brand with professional brand consultants.
profile_positions.title: Radiology IT portfolio manager

profile_positions.description: Supplier contract management, product roadmap control and framework management between PACS solutions supplier (not Philips) and Philips sales & service organizations..
profile_positions.title: Manager PACS group

profile_positions.description: Managing a team of product managers, instrumental in growing Philips world market share in Cathlabs from 35 to 41% and setting the stage for further market growth through the development and introduction of a new Cardiology IT image and information management program.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager Cardiac Cathlabs

profile_positions.description: Managing a team of product managers. I conceived an innovative and very successful new family of Cardiac Cathlab systems and have managed the worldwide introduction of it, firmly establishing Philip’s leadership in the Interventional Cardiology market.
profile_positions.title: Product Line Manager Cardiac Cathlabs

profile_positions.description: MT member of Philips’s UK sales and service organization. Managing a team of product managers in the Philips Healthcare UK market. Managed to put Philips CT and MR back on the UK map again where the organization had lost all momentum. The new emerging PACS market was entered successfully with several sales and installations.
profile_positions.title: Executive Marketing Director PMS UK

profile_positions.description: Using my medical and engineering background, I invented an out of the box new concept for Vascular Cathlabs. I deployed my skills as a team builder to engage the development team to deliver this new system in record breaking time form the factory and was instrumental in a very successful introduction that made Philips instantly successful in the global Vascular Cathlab market.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager Vascular systems
